email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. Laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $50.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the vessel's availability for a 100,000-ton cargo? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.25 per ton, which is competitive given the current market. The MV Ocean Star can accommodate 100,000 tons without issue. Let me know if this works. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 is acceptable. Let’s proceed. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the full vessel details and laytime terms. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. I’ll send the full vessel details and laytime terms shortly. Laytime will start from 15 October, 12:00 local time. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, contract sent for your review. Let me know if there are any issues. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best, Sarah
